[ 2 syll. za-hir, zah-ir ] The baby boy name Zahir is also used as a girl name. It is pronounced as Z AA-HHih-R or Zey-HH IH-R †. Zahir is largely used in the Arabic, Hebrew, Swahili, and Turkish languages, and it is derived from Arabic origins. It is derived literally from the word 'zahir' meaning apparent, manifest, bright. The name Az-Zahir was borne as one of the many of names of Allah in the Quran, of the meaning 'The Manifest'. The name Zahira (Arabic and Spanish) is the female equivalent of Zahir. Zahir has 21 variants that are used in English and other languages.

1 Zaheer is a common name in Asia and the Middle East that is inspired by the Islamic concept of Quran interpretation, which can be divided into its apparent meaning or zahir (Arabic: ظاهر ‎) and its inner meaning or batin (Arabic: باطن).

Muslim Meaning: The name Zaheer is a Muslim baby name. In Muslim the meaning of the name Zaheer is: Supporter. Ally. SoulUrge Number: 11. Expression Number: 9. People with this name have a deep inner desire to inspire others in a higher cause, and to share their own strongly held views on spiritual matters. People with this name tend to be passionate, compassionate, intuitive, romantic, and to have magnetic personalities.
